# bal-tag

A simple tag in different colors


<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                  | Type                                                              | Default |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------- | ------- |
| `type`   | `type`    | The theme type of the tag. Given by bulma our css framework. | `"" \| "danger" \| "info" \| "primary" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `''`    |


## Dependencies

- [bal-text](../bal-text)
